Attacks.name: Heavy
Attacks.info: Damages the next healthy token. Can damage [Token:Armour] tokens.

Attacks.name: Pierce
Attacks.info: Bypasses the next healthy token, and damages the next one.

Tokens.name: Heart
Tokens.info: Provides an action point when healthy.

Tokens.name: Armour
Tokens.info: Can only be damaged by [Attack:Heavy] attacks.
